SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT sum(CASE WHEN :3 OR T.STATUS_TASHLUM = 0 THEN T.SUM_TASHLUM_W_RIBIT ELSE T.SUM_TASHLUM_SHACH END) AS Amount_Owed ,sum(CASE WHEN T.STATUS_TASHLUM IN ( 5 ,6 ,7 ) THEN CASE WHEN :3 OR T.STATUS_TASHLUM = 0 THEN T.SUM_TASHLUM_W_RIBIT ELSE T.SUM_TASHLUM_SHACH END ELSE 0 END) AS Amount_Paid FROM A_TASHLUMIM T WHERE T.NUMERATOR_TIK = :1 AND T.DATE_MEKORI <= ':2' AND T.TZURAT_TASHLUM<>20

Column.name: תאריך ראשון בו חייב מעל 200 ש"ח
